price: Demikianlah (perintah Allah).  Dan barang siapa mengagungkan syiar-syiar Allah 991, maka sesungguhnya itu timbul dari ketakwaan hati.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَۖ وَمَن يُعَظِّمۡ شَعَٰٓئِرَ ٱللَّهِ فَإِنَّهَا مِن تَقۡوَى ٱلۡقُلُوبِ
footnotes: 991.  Arti "syiar Alla"h lihat catatan kaki nomor 389.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: dhālika waman yuʿaẓẓim shaʿāira al-lahi fa-innahā min taqwā al-qulūbi
